subscriptionEffectDescriptions.name: Remove Ads
subscriptionEffectDescriptions.description: Removes all ads from the game.

subscriptionEffectDescriptions.name: Pre-Release Songs
subscriptionEffectDescriptions.description: Allows you to play exclusive pre-release songs.

subscriptionEffectDescriptions.name: Obtainable EXP Limit Relief
subscriptionEffectDescriptions.description: Increases number of plays before reaching EXP acquisition limit.

subscriptionEffectDescriptions.name: Obtainable Point Limit Relief
subscriptionEffectDescriptions.description: Increases number of plays before reaching point acquisition limit.

subscriptionEffectDescriptions.name: Limit Removal Criteria Relief
subscriptionEffectDescriptions.description: Relaxes the criteria for removing limits.

subscriptionEffectDescriptions.name: Remove Ads
subscriptionEffectDescriptions.description: Removes all ads from the game.

subscriptionEffectDescriptions.name: Item Point Distribution
subscriptionEffectDescriptions.description:
During the valid period of the passport,
you can receive Free Coins rewards
for completing challenges.
Challenge: Log in every day between 4:00 a.m. and 3:59 a.m. (GMT+9) of the following day.
Reward: Once you complete a challenge, 300 Item Points will be sent to your gift box.
(Available for 30 days.)
subscriptionEffectDescriptions.caution:
*If purchased between 12:00 a.m. and 3:59 a.m. (GMT+9), you can log in again after 4:00 a.m. (GMT+9) to receive your rewards.
If purchased after 4:00 a.m. (GMT+9), log in the following day after 4:00 a.m. (GMT+9) to receive your rewards.
*Challenges renew daily at 4:00 a.m. (GMT+9) during the passport period.
*If you were logged in before 4:00 a.m. (GMT+9), you will need to log in again to receive your rewards.
*If you are unable to log in between 4:00 a.m. and 3:59 a.m. (GMT+9) of the following day, you will be unable to claim your rewards for that period.

subscriptionEffectDescriptions.name: Remove Some Ads
subscriptionEffectDescriptions.description:
The following in-game advertisements will be removed.

Ads that appear when updating the Home List
Ads that appear after a certain number of slide operations in a search
Ads that appear after completing a song

*Please note that other advertisements will still be shown.

Challenge: Log in every day between 4:00 a.m. and 3:59 a.m. (GMT+9) of the following day.

subscriptionEffectDescriptions.caution:

If purchased after 4:00 a.m. (GMT+9), log in the following day after 4:00 a.m. (GMT+9) to receive your rewards.

*If you are unable to log in between 4:00 a.m. and 3:59 a.m. (GMT+9) of the following day, you will be unable to claim your rewards for that period.
